verses.text: But the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w committed|strong="H4603"\w* a \w trespass|strong="H4604"\w* in the accursed \w thing|strong="H2764"\w*: for \w Achan|strong="H5912"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Carmi|strong="H3756"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zabdi|strong="H2067"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zerah|strong="H2226"\w*, of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w took|strong="H3947"\w* of the accursed \w thing|strong="H2764"\w*: and the \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* against the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 7.1 \ft Achan: also called, Achar\f*\f + \fr 7.1 \ft Zabdi: also called, Zimri\f*

And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* from \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w* to \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w*, which \add is\add* \w beside|strong="H5973"\w* \w Beth-aven|strong="H1007"\w*, on the east \w side|strong="H6924"\w* of \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*, and \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* and \w view|strong="H7270"\w* the \w country|strong="H0776"\w*. And the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* and \w viewed|strong="H7270"\w* \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w*.

And they \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* to \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Let not all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* go \w up|strong="H5927"\w*; but let about two or \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* and \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w*; \add and\add* make not all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* to \w labour|strong="H3021"\w* thither; for they \add are but\add* \w few|strong="H4592"\w*.\f + \fr 7.3 \ft about…: Heb. about two thousand men, or, about three thousand men\f*

So there went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* thither of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* about \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*: and they \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w*.

And the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* of them about \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*: for they \w chased|strong="H7291"\w* them \add from\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \add even\add* unto \w Shebarim|strong="H7671"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* them in the going \w down|strong="H4174"\w*: wherefore the \w hearts|strong="H3824"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w melted|strong="H4549"\w*, and became as \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.\f + \fr 7.5 \ft in…: or, in Morad\f*

¶ And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w rent|strong="H7167"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H8071"\w*, and \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* to the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* upon his \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* until the \w eventide|strong="H6153"\w*, he and the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5927"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* upon their \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*.

And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Alas, \w O|strong="H0162"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, wherefore hast thou at \w all|strong="H5674"\w* \w brought|strong="H5674"\w* this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, to \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* us into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, to \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* us? would to \w God|strong="H3863"\w* we had been \w content|strong="H2974"\w*, and \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* on the other \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*!

\w O|strong="H0994"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, what shall I \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w when|strong="H0310"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w turneth|strong="H2015"\w* their \w backs|strong="H6203"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*!\f + \fr 7.8 \ft backs: Heb. necks\f*

For the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* and all the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \add of it\add*, and shall environ us \w round|strong="H5437"\w*, and cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* our \w name|strong="H8034"\w* from the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: and what wilt thou \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto thy \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*?

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, Get thee \w up|strong="H6965"\w*; wherefore \w liest|strong="H5307"\w* thou thus upon thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w*?\f + \fr 7.10 \ft liest: Heb. fallest\f*

\w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* hath \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*, and they have also \w transgressed|strong="H5674"\w* my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* which I \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* them: for they have even \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* of the accursed \w thing|strong="H2764"\w*, and have also \w stolen|strong="H1589"\w*, and \w dissembled|strong="H3584"\w* also, and they have \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \add it\add* even among their own \w stuff|strong="H3627"\w*.

Therefore the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* not \w stand|strong="H6965"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, \add but\add* \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* \add their\add* \w backs|strong="H6203"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, because they were \w accursed|strong="H2764"\w*: neither will I be with you any \w more|strong="H3254"\w*, \w except|strong="H3808"\w* ye \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* the \w accursed|strong="H2764"\w* from \w among|strong="H7130"\w* you.

\w Up|strong="H6965"\w*, \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* yourselves against to \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w*: for thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add There is\add* an accursed \w thing|strong="H2764"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of thee, O \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: thou \w canst|strong="H3201"\w* not \w stand|strong="H6965"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, until ye take \w away|strong="H5493"\w* the accursed \w thing|strong="H2764"\w* from \w among|strong="H7130"\w* you.

In the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* therefore ye shall be \w brought|strong="H7126"\w* according to your \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w*: and it shall be, \add that\add* the \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w taketh|strong="H3920"\w* shall \w come|strong="H7126"\w* according to the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* \add thereof;\add* and the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall \w take|strong="H3920"\w* shall \w come|strong="H7126"\w* by \w households|strong="H1004"\w*; and the \w household|strong="H1004"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall \w take|strong="H3920"\w* shall \w come|strong="H7126"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* by \w man|strong="H1397"\w*.

And it shall be, \add that\add* he that is \w taken|strong="H3920"\w* with the accursed \w thing|strong="H2764"\w* shall be \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, he and all that he hath: because he hath \w transgressed|strong="H5674"\w* the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and because he hath \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* \w folly|strong="H5039"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 7.15 \ft folly: or, wickedness\f*

¶ So \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* rose up \w early|strong="H7925"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H7126"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* by their \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w*; and the \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* was \w taken|strong="H3920"\w*:

And he \w brought|strong="H7126"\w* the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*; and he \w took|strong="H3920"\w* the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Zarhites|strong="H2227"\w*: and he \w brought|strong="H7126"\w* the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Zarhites|strong="H2227"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* by \w man|strong="H1397"\w*; and \w Zabdi|strong="H2067"\w* was \w taken|strong="H3920"\w*:

And he \w brought|strong="H7126"\w* his \w household|strong="H1004"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* by \w man|strong="H1397"\w*; and \w Achan|strong="H5912"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Carmi|strong="H3756"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zabdi|strong="H2067"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zerah|strong="H2226"\w*, of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, was \w taken|strong="H3920"\w*.

And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Achan|strong="H5912"\w*, My \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w give|strong="H7760"\w*, I pray thee, \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w confession|strong="H8426"\w* unto him; and \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* me now what thou hast \w done|strong="H6213"\w*; \w hide|strong="H3582"\w* \add it\add* not from me.

And \w Achan|strong="H5912"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Indeed|strong="H0546"\w* I have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* against the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and thus and thus have I \w done|strong="H6213"\w*:

When I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* among the \w spoils|strong="H7998"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w goodly|strong="H2896"\w* \w Babylonish|strong="H8152"\w* \w garment|strong="H0155"\w*, and two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w wedge|strong="H3956"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* of \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w* \w weight|strong="H4948"\w*, then I \w coveted|strong="H2530"\w* them, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* them; and, behold, they \add are\add* \w hid|strong="H2934"\w* in the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of my \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*, and the \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* under it.\f + \fr 7.21 \ft wedge: Heb. tongue\f*

¶ So \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w*, and they \w ran|strong="H7323"\w* unto the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*; and, behold, \add it was\add* \w hid|strong="H2934"\w* in his \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*, and the \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* under it.

And they \w took|strong="H3947"\w* them out of the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* them unto \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, and unto all the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and laid them \w out|strong="H3332"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 7.23 \ft laid: Heb. poured\f*

And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, and all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* with him, \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Achan|strong="H5912"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zerah|strong="H2226"\w*, and the \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and the \w garment|strong="H0155"\w*, and the \w wedge|strong="H3956"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and his \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, and his \w oxen|strong="H7794"\w*, and his \w asses|strong="H2543"\w*, and his \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, and his \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*, and all that he had: and they \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* them unto the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* of \w Achor|strong="H5911"\w*.

And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* hast thou \w troubled|strong="H5916"\w* us? the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w trouble|strong="H5916"\w* thee this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*. And all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w stoned|strong="H7275"\w* him with \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, and \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* them with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, after they had \w stoned|strong="H5619"\w* them with \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*.

And they \w raised|strong="H6965"\w* over him a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w heap|strong="H1530"\w* of \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*. So the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* from the \w fierceness|strong="H2740"\w* of his \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*. Wherefore the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of that \w place|strong="H4725"\w* was \w called|strong="H7121"\w*, The \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* of \w Achor|strong="H5911"\w*, unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 7.26 \ft Achor: that is, Trouble\f*
